context: The cover image for the article titled 'Audio i interfejs głosowy', which discusses the use of large language models and the integration of text-to-speech and speech-to-text models for advanced voice interfaces.
description: The image serves as the cover for an article titled "Audio i interfejs głosowy," highlighting the use of large language models in advanced voice interfaces. Central to the composition is an abstract depiction of a large microphone, around which vibrant green paint splatters spread dynamically against a stark white background. A small silhouetted figure stands gazing at the microphone, creating a sense of scale and emphasizing the theme of human interaction with technology. This visual metaphorically represents the integration of text-to-speech and speech-to-text technologies, underscoring the transformative potential of voice interfaces in digital communication.
preview: The image features a large, abstract microphone in the center. Surrounding the microphone are vibrant green paint splatters, contrasting against a white background. In the lower section, a small silhouetted figure stands facing the microphone, adding a sense of scale and intrigue to the composition.
name: S02E01-1727094804.png

alt: Interfejs głosowy umożliwiający interakcję z LLM w formie 'rozmowy telefonicznej', bez konieczności ręcznej kontroli z pomocą przycisków
context: This image shows a voice interface that enables interaction with a large language model (LLM) in a 'phone call' format, eliminating the need for manual control with buttons. It illustrates the concept of a voice-operated conversational interface as discussed in the lesson.
description: The image illustrates a voice-operated conversational interface designed as a 'phone call' format with a large language model. Set against a dark background, the interface shows a chat-like interaction with two speech bubbles—one in blue asking, "Hey there, what's up? How are you?" and a gray response stating, "Hey Adam! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you? What's new with you?" Below this exchange is a blue "Hang up" button. This interface exemplifies a hands-free communication method, aligning with the lesson's focus on voice-controlled technologies.
preview: The image is a screenshot of a messaging interface on a dark background. It contains a conversation with two speech bubbles: one in blue asking 'Hey there, what's up? How are you?' and another in gray responding with 'Hey Adam! I'm doing well, thanks for asking. How about you? What's new with you?' Below the conversation is a 'Hang up' button in blue.
name: aidevs3_voiceui-da474703-1.png

context: The image pertains to the Whisper model by OpenAI and its ability to support various audio formats like flac, mp3, mp4, etc., with file size limits. It emphasizes Whisper's capabilities in effective transcription and handling audio formats up to a certain file size.
description: The image displays the dark-themed interface of 'groqcloud,' highlighting the Whisper model, specifically 'whisper-large-v3.' It showcases options for speech input through 'Start Recording' and 'Select File.' The interface supports various audio formats such as flac, mp3, and mp4, with a 25MB file size limit, emphasizing Whisper's capabilities in effective transcription and handling of audio files.
preview: The image shows a dark-themed user interface labeled 'groqcloud' with options for speech input, including 'Start Recording' and 'Select File.' It features a dropdown menu labeled 'whisper-large-v3' and file support details at the bottom.
name: aidevs3_whisper-6cc958bc-1.png

context: This illustrates how system prompts are used in the Whisper model to enhance transcription accuracy by including a vocabulary relevant to the content, distinct from instructions followed by large language models. It highlights the transcription process utilizing system prompts.
description: The image showcases a digital interface with a black background, part of a system used in the Whisper model for transcription. On the left, specific name spellings—'AI_devs, eduweb, Tech•sistence'—are noted to improve transcription accuracy by introducing relevant vocabulary. The right side features audio options such as 'Start Recording' and 'Select File,' complete with a waveform icon, illustrating the transcription process. Below, the transcript segment reads, "Hello there, it's Adam from Tech•sistence," demonstrating the integration of system prompts in transcription to enhance content relevance, distinct from language model instructions.
preview: The image shows a digital interface with a black background. On the left, there's text stating name spellings and mentions 'AI_devs, eduweb, Tech•sistence.' On the right, audio options like 'Start Recording' and 'Select File' are displayed, with a waveform icon. Below, a segment displays a transcript: 'Hello there, it's Adam from Tech•sistence.'
name: aidevs3_audioprompt-6628ec95-1.png

context: The image discusses a notable issue with the Whisper model where, upon processing a 5-second silence recording, it erroneously transcribed 'Thank you.' It highlights the problem of incorrect transcription during silence or very short commands.
description: The image displays an audio interface with features for starting a recording and selecting a file, along with details on file size and supported formats. Below, a segment labeled 'Thank you.' is transcribed, accompanied by an option to copy JSON data. The notable aspect, as highlighted by the context, is the erroneous transcription produced by the Whisper model when processing a 5-second silence. The vivid green background contrasts with the interface, emphasizing the transcription error in silent recordings or very short commands.
preview: The image shows an audio interface with options to start recording and select a file. It includes file size details and supported formats. A segment labeled 'Thank you.' appears below, with a button to copy JSON data on the right. The background is bright green.
name: aidevs3_silence-fc37cd91-0.png

alt: Interakcja głosowa niemal zawsze będzie wymagała dodatkowej logiki, umożliwiającej dostęp do narzędzi i/lub pamięci długoterminowej
context: The image explains that voice interactions often require additional logic for accessing tools or long-term memory, stressing the importance of integrating external knowledge sources to ensure comprehensive voice interface functionality.
description: The image is a diagram illustrating the flow of voice interaction, consisting of three stages: 'Audio Input' in a yellow dashed box, 'Processing' in a red dashed box, and 'Audio Output' in a green dashed box, connected by arrows. The black background accentuates the progression from input to output, highlighting the central 'Processing' stage. This depiction emphasizes the need for integrating additional logic, access to tools, and external knowledge sources to enhance the functionality and comprehensiveness of voice interfaces, as indicated by the contextual information.
preview: The image is a diagram with three stages: 'Audio Input' in a yellow dashed box, 'Processing' in a red dashed box, and 'Audio Output' in a green dashed box, connected by arrows on a black background.
name: aidevs3_audioui-541fc154-1.png

context: This visual describes an audio interface where recording starts with microphone connection, voice detection initiates transcription, and interaction progresses by generating responses post-silence. It outlines a structured approach for capturing and processing audio inputs.
description: The image shows a JavaScript code snippet within a code editor, focused on an asynchronous function called `startRecording`. This script is designed to initiate an audio recording by accessing a user's microphone, establishing an audio context, and implementing custom audio processing via an AudioWorklet. The function also features real-time frequency analysis for visualization and uses a try-catch block for error management. Comments within the code highlight its functionality. This visual aligns with the context by illustrating a systematic method for capturing and processing audio inputs, facilitating voice detection, transcription, and interaction through response generation post-silence. The code is presented on a dark background with color-highlighted syntax for clarity.
preview: The image displays a code editor with JavaScript code for an asynchronous function named 'startRecording'. The function initializes an audio context, accesses the user's microphone, and sets up audio processing and visualization. It uses try-catch for error handling and includes comments explaining the code logic. The background is dark, and the code syntax is color-highlighted for readability.
name: aidevs3_recording-9d146326-4.png

context: The image refers to transcription interfaces that justify using dedicated solutions like Happyscribe or AssemblyAI for longer audio content, indicating the benefit of pre-existing solutions due to their API availability and comprehensive interfaces.
description: The image displays a transcription interface, illustrating the utility of dedicated solutions like Happyscribe or AssemblyAI for processing longer audio content. On the left, there's a detailed transcript with timestamps and text, while on the right, a video preview showcases a digital assistant app with a purple background. The setup emphasizes the advantages of using comprehensive interfaces and APIs provided by such services for effective transcription management.
preview: The image shows a user interface with a transcription panel on the left and a video preview with a purple background on the right. The transcript includes timestamps and text lines, while the video preview displays a digital assistant app interface. Playback controls are visible at the bottom.
name: aidevs3_transcript-d0bbfb89-b.png

context: This discusses the structure of a voice interface that includes audio quality verification, dynamic silence detection, contextual transcription, and confirmation of actions, emphasizing the complexity of achieving high-quality real-time voice interaction with LLMs.
description: The image is a flowchart diagram with a green border on a dark background, illustrating a voice interface system's architecture. It depicts the flow of audio and text data through various components, such as the User, User Interface, Backend Server, and systems for Transcription (using OpenAI Whisper or Groq Whisper) and Chat Completion (via OpenAI Chat API). The chart shows processes like transcription, error handling, and text-to-speech conversion with tools like OpenAI TTS and ElevenLabs TTS, connected by purple lines and arrows. This structure emphasizes the complexity of achieving high-quality, real-time voice interaction with large language models (LLMs) by integrating elements like audio quality verification, dynamic silence detection, and contextual transcription.
preview: A flowchart diagram with a green border on a dark background, illustrating an audio processing system. It includes components such as User, User Interface, Backend Server, Transcription with OpenAI Whisper, and Chat Completion with OpenAI Chat API. The chart shows the flow of audio and text data through processes like transcription, error handling, and text-to-speech, using purple connecting lines and arrows.
name: aidevs3_voice-aab7724c-0.png
